threads.title: 820-000165 flicker screen
threads.message: this macbook had corrosion under it u7701and <CHIP>U3210</CHIP>, I changed <CHIP>U7701</CHIP> and  clean <CHIP>U7701</CHIP> problem persists, also test good display problem persist

threads.title: 820-000165 flicker screen
threads.message:
Backlight flickers, or image?
Did you check with external monitor?
XW7720 is surely good?

threads.title: 820-000165 flicker screen
threads.message:
I think flickers image
no external video
xw7720 I could not find it on board, where it is?

threads.title: 820-000165 flicker screen
threads.message:
Check for fluctuations at backlight output rail.
Test with different backlight settings.

BTW, search function still works...
